Details.Name: Petrol
Details.Feature: Up to 20.88% discount at Esso Stations - 5% Esso site discount + 5% Smiles card discount + 4% Citicard discount + 8% Citi DIVIDEND Cash rebate on nett purchase

Up to 20.8% discount at Shell stations - 5% Shell site discount + 5% Shell Escape discount + 4% Citi Rebate (applies after Shell discount) + 8% Citi DIVIDEND Cash rebate (applies after Shell discount)
Total minimum spend of $888/month, capped at DIV$25 per category

Details.Name: Grocery
Details.Feature: Up to 8% cash back at selected supermarkets and grocery stores worldwide*
Total minimum spend of $888/month, capped at DIV$25 per category
0.25% cash back on all other retail spend
*From 1st March 2016, earning & redemption @ Cold Storage, Market Place, Jasons, Giant & Guardian will cease

Details.Name: Cash Back
Details.Feature: Petrol: Up to 20.88% at Esso, 20.8% at Shell, and 8% cash back at all other petrol stations
Groceries: Up to 8% cash back at ALL supermarkets and grocery stores worldwide
Dining: Up to 8% cash back at all food and beverage outlets globally
Total minimum spend of $888/month, capped at DIV$25 per category
Others: 0.25% cash back on all other retail spend

Details.Name: Dining
Details.Feature: Up to 8% cash back on all your dining spends globally with your Citibank Dividend Card
Exclusive dining deals with Citi Gourmet Pleasures at top restaurants such as Kuro Restaurant & Bar, Skyve Wine Bistro and more
1-for-1 drinks at Zouk Wine Bar and Velvet Underground
Up to 10% rebate at over 700 merchant outlets including Burger King, Cold Storage, Shell and Starbucks.
Total minimum spend of $888/month, capped at DIV$25 per category

Details.Name: Shopping
Details.Feature: 0.25% cash back on all other spend
5% cash back on online shipping charges

Details.Name: Eligibility
Details.Feature: Singaporean Minimum Income$30,000
Non-Singaporean Minimum Income$42,000

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Annual Fee (Supplementary)$96.30
Annual Fee (Principal)$192.60
Fee WaiverFirst year fee waived for Principal and two (2) Supplementary cards
